Yea, this week, we are talking about Druids and Faeries.

I always that spells of protection are overdone.  If you are going to 
have a power of cast spells of protection, there should be an 
alternate of "remove spell of protection".  Of course, IMHO one major 
bug in the game is killing a character does not remove the spell of 
protection surrounding the character.  Also, there should be some 
limits on how many trees can be created by the druids on each team.  
Excessive amounts of trees have a decremental effect on the speed of 
the game [See my "Druid Island" scenarios in the torture set for an 
example of the trees slowing down a scenario.]  I might suggest an 
alternate attack of "remove trees" (save time removing those trees) or 
an alternate attack of "grow more trees" (grow 8 trees surrounding 
your druid at a time).

I believe there should be a limit about how much time a faerie can 
keep your character frozen without having a chance to escape the 
situation.  Also, faeries do need another attack.  I would suggest 
giving high experience level faeries the ability to carry teammates 
short distances over water and forested areas.

*upcoming topics*

Next week is Golems and towers.

After that, it's Giant Skeletons and Fire Elementals.
 
After that, it's skeletons and ghosts.
 
After that, it's clerics and archmages.

After that, it's orc captains and thieves.
 
After that, it's proposed new character classes - not promotions or 
hybrids/dual class.

After that, it's more proposed new character class - promotions of 
existing classes only.

*end upcoming topics*
